lyrics.spanish: Sí, sabes que ya llevo un rato mirándote
lyrics.english: Yes, you know I've been looking at you for a while

lyrics.spanish: Tengo que bailar contigo hoy
lyrics.english: I have to dance with you today

lyrics.spanish: Vi que tu mirada ya estaba llamándome
lyrics.english: I saw that your gaze was already calling me

lyrics.spanish: Muéstrame el camino que yo voy
lyrics.english: Show me the way and I'll go

lyrics.spanish: Despacito, quiero respirar tu cuello despacito
lyrics.english: Slowly, I want to breathe your neck slowly

lyrics.spanish: Deja que te diga cosas al oído
lyrics.english: Let me tell you things in your ear

lyrics.spanish: Para que te acuerdes si no estás conmigo
lyrics.english: So you remember when you're not with me

lyrics.spanish: Voy a reír, voy a bailar
lyrics.english: I'm going to laugh, I'm going to dance

lyrics.spanish: Vivir mi vida, la la la la
lyrics.english: Live my life, la la la la

lyrics.spanish: Voy a vivir el momento
lyrics.english: I'm going to live the moment

lyrics.spanish: Para entender el destino
lyrics.english: To understand destiny

lyrics.spanish: Voy a escuchar en silencio
lyrics.english: I'm going to listen in silence

lyrics.spanish: Yo te miro, se me corta la respiración
lyrics.english: I look at you, I lose my breath

lyrics.spanish: Cuando tú me miras, se me sube el corazón
lyrics.english: When you look at me, my heart races

lyrics.spanish: Y en silencio tu mirada dice mil palabras
lyrics.english: And in silence your gaze says a thousand words

lyrics.spanish: La noche en la que te suplico que no salga el sol
lyrics.english: The night in which I beg that the sun doesn't come out

lyrics.spanish: Nada voy a hacer rebuscando en el pasado
lyrics.english: I'm not going to do anything searching in the past

lyrics.spanish: No voy a morirme por nada del pasado
lyrics.english: I'm not going to die for anything from the past

lyrics.spanish: Hoy tengo mi mente ocupada en cosas más importantes
lyrics.english: Today I have my mind occupied with more important things

lyrics.spanish: Me rehúso a darte un último beso
lyrics.english: I refuse to give you one last kiss

lyrics.spanish: Así que solo me queda seguir este camino
lyrics.english: So all that's left is to follow this path

lyrics.spanish: Pero yo me rehúso a aceptar que terminó
lyrics.english: But I refuse to accept that it's over

lyrics.spanish: Ya no tiene excusa
lyrics.english: She has no excuse anymore

lyrics.spanish: Hoy salió con su amiga, dizque pa' matar la tusa
lyrics.english: Today she went out with her friend, supposedly to kill the heartbreak

lyrics.spanish: Que porque un hombre le pagó mal
lyrics.english: Because a man treated her badly

lyrics.spanish: Y si con otro pasas el rato
lyrics.english: And if you spend time with someone else

lyrics.spanish: Vamo' a ser felices los cuatro
lyrics.english: We're all going to be happy, the four of us

lyrics.spanish: Te voy a dar de lo que te gusta
lyrics.english: I'm going to give you what you like

lyrics.spanish: Habana, ooh na-na
lyrics.english: Havana, ooh na-na

lyrics.spanish: La mitad de mi corazón está en La Habana
lyrics.english: Half of my heart is in Havana

lyrics.spanish: Me llevó de regreso al este de Atlanta
lyrics.english: Took me back to East Atlanta

lyrics.spanish: Ella quiere beber, ella quiere bailar
lyrics.english: She wants to drink, she wants to dance

lyrics.spanish: Ella quiere beber, para olvidar
lyrics.english: She wants to drink, to forget

lyrics.spanish: Porque su ex la dejó, porque ya no volverá
lyrics.english: Because her ex left her, because he won't come back

lyrics.spanish: Esto vive, no para, esto sigue y sigue
lyrics.english: This lives on, it doesn't stop, this continues and continues

lyrics.spanish: Con altura, muchos duros pa mi altura
lyrics.english: With class, lots of money for my level

lyrics.spanish: Flores pa' tu cintura, que sólo quede la locura
lyrics.english: Flowers for your waist, may only craziness remain
